title: Soul-Aion 4.4
description: Aion, one of the most popular massively multiplayer online role-playing games in South Korea, is now free-to-play worldwide. Already filled to the brim with content, the Aion: Ascension free-to-play update introduces mounts, non-instanced player housing, furniture crafting, over 600 new quests, new zones, new instances, improved graphics, NVIDIA-exclusive features, and much much more. Unlike many other free-to-play massively multiplayer online role-playing games, Aion is truly free, giving players unrestricted access to all of the gameÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s content, classes, items, and player levels. Furthermore, Ascension introduces the Atreian Atlus, lowering the barrier of entry for newcomers by offering tips, strategy guides, walkthroughs, and instructional videos, in addition to a personalized roadmap displaying accomplishments and what lies ahead. As you can see in the videos and images, accessible through the navigation bar on the left, Aion looks fantastic, having received a significant graphics upgrade in 2011. Ascension introduces a few further tweaks and enhancements, but more importantly includes full NVIDIA 3D Vision and NVIDIA Surround support, giving players a high-fidelity experience. If youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re looking for something new to play itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s hard not to recommend Aion Ã¢â‚¬â€œ itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s free, it looks fantastic, the gameplay is polished to a tee following several years of updates, and other players donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t receive competitive advantages if they choose to spend real money.
